#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string str;
    getline(cin,str);
    int i=0;
    while(str[i])
    {
                 cout<<str[i];
                 if((str[i]=='a')||(str[i]=='e')||(str[i]=='i')||(str[i]=='o')||(str[i]=='u'))
                 i+=2;
                 i++;
                 }
}
